params._newMerkleRoot: calculated root-hash of merkle-proof off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process

changePhaseLock().details: only owner could call this function.

params._newPreSaleDate: the new pre-sale date to change.

params._newPublicSaleDate: the new public-sale date to change.

params._newRevealDate: the new reveal date to change.

params._init_pre_sale_price: is the price of NFTs in pre-sale phase.
params._merkle_root: is the hash of merkle tree used for whitelist function - caluclated off-chain.
params._startPreSaleDate: is the time that pre-sale should start.
params._startPublicSaleDate: is the time that public sale phase should start.
params._startRevealDate: is the time that reveal phase should start.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

royaltyInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Returns how much royalty is owed and to whom, based on a sale price that may be denominated in any unit of exchange. The royalty amount is denominated and should be paid in that same unit of exchange.

startPreSale().details: collection phase is initialy on pre-sale phase, so we don't need to change that.

params._tokenId: is the tokenId of that NFT you want its tokenURI.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).

params._merkleProof: calculated merkle-proof off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process.

changeMerkleRoot(bytes32).notice: onlyOwner of the contract could call this function.

changePhaseLock().notice: this function is use for modifying public function callable using for a specific phase.

changePreSaleDate(uint256).notice: changing the pre-defined pre-sale date if it's necessary.this function is only callable from the contract owner - it doesn't effect on decentralization rule.

changePublicSaleDate(uint256).notice: changing the pre-defined pre-sale date if it's necessary.this function is only callable from the contract owner - it doesn't effect on decentralization rule.

changeRevealDate(uint256).notice: changing the pre-defined Reveal date if it's necessary.this function is only callable from the contract owner - it doesn't effect on decentralization rule.

constructor.notice: using Ownable to granting access to the contract's deployer won't effect on centralization rule.owner accessability restricted to managing phase that we are in, not manipulating critical functionlaities.

init_pre_sale_price().notice: is the price of NFTs in pre-sale phase.

mintNFT().notice: this function is callable in public-sale phase.to call this function msg.sender has to own msg.value more than PUBLIC_SALE_MINT_PRICE. Invariant: the tokenId is always less than COLLECTION_MAX_SUPPLY.

startPreSale().notice: only owner of the contract could call this function.This function can be called just once.to call this function we have to be in the pre-sale phase.

startPublicSale().notice: only owner of the contract could call this function.This function can be called just once.to call this function we have to be in the public-sale phase.

startReveal().notice: only owner of the contract could call this function.This function can be called just once.to call this function we have to be in the Reveal phase.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: getting ipfs url (represent tokenURI) to get correspond tokenId NFT metadata.the tokenURI format is https://ipfs.io/ipfs/{tokenId},json

transferOwnership(address).notice: Can only be called by the current owner.

whiteListMint(bytes32[]).notice: Eligible user could call this function to mint his NFT in pre-sale phase.

documentation.text: @notice is the price of NFTs in pre-sale phase.
@notice is a date in block.timestamp which pre-sale phase starts.
@notice is a date that collection reveal will occur.
@notice is a date in block.timestamp which public-sale phase starts.
@notice is the current phase that we are in, based on PHASE enum.
@notice totalMinted is the total NFT minted during all phases - counter.
@notice is the root-hash of merkle tree which calculated off-chain.
@notice preSaled is done or not.
@notice reveal phase is done or not.
@notice publicSaled is done or not.
@notice this boolean is used to change the useability of functions relatedt to a phase.
@notice id minter minted his NFT in pre-sale phase, it's value will be true.
@notice function is callable just if we be temporally in that time range.

@param _newMerkleRoot calculated root-hash of merkle-proof off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process
 @notice onlyOwner of the contract could call this function.

@dev Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).
 @notice Can only be called by the current owner.

@param _merkleProof calculated merkle-proof off-chain to facilitate the whitelist process.
 @notice Eligible user could call this function to mint his NFT in pre-sale phase.

@notice this function is use for modifying public function callable using for a specific phase.
 @dev only owner could call this function.
@notice there is no time-overflow until 2106 AC.
